name: Block
description:
On Play: Chose one: 
* Draw a card. 
* Your oponent discards a card.

name: Deaden Impact
description:
Only play if your foe's stance is neutral
On Play: Chose one: 
* Draw 2 cards. * Gain 2 stam. 
On End: Lose 1 stam

name: Closeguard
description:
You must discard an attack to play this
On Play: Your opponent reveals 2 cards

name: Analyze
description:
Only play this when you're adjacent to an opponent 
On Play: Draw 2 cards unless the opponent's Play to this contained an attack.

name: Slash
description: Your opponent's action in the Play to this costs 1 additional stamina. On Hit: Deal 1 damage

name: Feint
description: This can't be in the Play to an attack. On Hit: deal 1 damage

name: Dodge
description: On Play: If the opponent's Play to this doesn't contain an attack, move up to 2 tiles and end this exchange
Notes: This is parasitic becuase it ends an encounter for free. It should cost a discard to play

name: Crush
description: On Hit: Deal 1 damage. Then, if this is in the Play to the opponent's block, draw 2 cards
Notes: This basically cycles then does nothing if you get Hit. Maybe you get 2 temporary stamina

name: Parry
description: On Play: If your opponent's Play to this doesn't contain an attack, your opponent loses 2 stamina and discards 2 cards

name: Focus
description: On play: Your next card in this Play costs 1 less stamina to play

name: Inner Eye
description: On Play: If your opponent's Play to this contains a block draw 2 cards. Otherwise gain 2 stamina

name: Guard Break
description: Only play this in the Play to an opponent's block. The attack you play in this Play deals +1 damage on Hit

name: Slam
description: On Hit: push the opponent back 1 hex

Notes: Attacks mutliple opponents, requiring card reveal or discard to prevent damage
Draw a couple cards after the Play to this
Deal damage to all opponents adj. unless they discard a card
